item.title: About
item.description: Before Angels with Scaly Wings, there were Angels with Broken Hearts. Angels with Broken Hearts is a webcomic that explores the lives of many characters from Angels with Scaly Wings, and takes place in three different settings - each drawn by a different artist. New pages will be released for free on our website, but supporting us on Patreon will get you many exclusive perks, such as: Early access to finished pages.
